website_summaries.verdict: One of the best middle ground options for a beginner-friendly mini desktop.
pros: Internal hard drive compartment is compatible with both physical and solid state options up to two terabytes
Wireless compatibility is built into the case
cons: Fast boot feature can cause performance and startup issues and may require disabling

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Small.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to add SSD. Has everything you need in a computer (minus peripherals like speakers etc). I tested it with a CAD render and it was actually not bad. Not a render farm substitute, but not shabby. After one month of simple use as a slide show source to s multichannel video mixer => dead. Totally. First the connection to an SSD unit failed (lower portion connected by C connector. So Just left off. But a month later = a stone. No trace of any life at all. No boot anything.
customer_reviews.author: Newlpost

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. I am able to clone the windows 10 from the onboard 32GB storage to the SSD drive I added and boot windows from the SSD after doing some research in YOUTUBE. The machine exceeded expectations -- it runs Windows 10 well, and handles web browsing, email, video, and light gaming like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: wow -- small and windows 10 pro installation was so easy - took awhile for the updates(thanks microsoft) but the boot up is really fast . Open multiple windows and didn't see any slow down . Love the idea of hiding the unit behind the TV and going to add extra storage to accommodate all my wife's pictures and the installation is so simple .Unit is really cute to behold and for the price think its great value . There is enough usb ports to had extra stuff if required - ie external dvd unit . I've only had the unit for a short while but i'm in love with it - one of my best buys this year
customer_reviews.author: GaryS

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience with ACEPC AK1
customer_reviews.text: The WiFi is always disconnected. I reset my several tiems my router and works for one minute, but always fail. I have some others devies connected by WiFi to the same router without problems. Also, i disable and enable the wifi card in control pannel, and have the same result. The ACEPC AK1 kill also my 1TB hdd. I buy a new one SSD and now is working, but how long? The return window expires and the wifi fails start. Very bad experience with this MiniPC.
customer_reviews.author: Juan E. Villarreal Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great PC for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Love this mini pc. This is my first mini Pc. It is everything promised. Quiet, and powerful and the installed Win 10 pro loads smoothly upon startup. I would recommend adding a 128 Ssd and cloning the OS. The 32 Gb Drive is just big enough for Windows. With the small drive Windows upgrades would be very difficult. The pc has a number of ports. I have attached peripherals easily. I kept the original windows on the small drive. So I can always boot from it in an emergency. My only complaint is the lack of documentation. So I had to search the web to find out how to enter the boot configuration as an example.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for a small file server 24/7
customer_reviews.text: After a bit of a rocky start (MS update trying to take all the available space for 1803 immediately), I used a clone software to add a 500 GB SSD and then the fantastic SSD holder (great design and something I wasn't seeing in the others I looked at). Now the internal SSD is bypassed (and a back-up), booting to the 500 gig. Pretty quick and file transfers of over 110 MB/sec over gigabit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in SD

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I'm really hoping the seller/manufacturer will see this and care enough to contact me. I purchased this on September 26, 2018. It will not boot anymore. The blue light turns on, then turns off about 5 seconds later. If I'm doing something wrong, I'm happy to try anything. Otherwise, this was just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Aisling526

customer_reviews.title: Will not last, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for home theater use. One failed after 4 months second one turns off randomly,waiting for full failure. If you don't want disposable, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Novalie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this miniPC. I use it as a Plex server for my videos. Only problem is I had a issue with the fan going out, no way to reach the company for warranty or tech support or anything.
customer_reviews.author: The_Jackyl

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Great for living room entertainment or light office work. Nice design. Easily plugged in an SSD and moved the OS to it for more space. Everything works. It runs great for streaming movies and music on LAN or WiFi. With the mounting bracket included, I could put it out of sight and taking up no space, but left it sitting on a small shelf because it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff S

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic replacement for the clunky desktop
customer_reviews.text: Works great out of the box, runs cool with no fan. I put in a 2tb drive to use it for video capture. Tested with iSpy and Blus Iris, it supports both. Side note - I like the features of Blue Iris, but iSpy has a much better user interface. Speed is just OK, definitely not a gamer machine but works well as a general purpose computer.
customer_reviews.author: douggie-com

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed at how good this computer has worked up to now
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed at how good this computer has worked up to now. Fast and running all day every day. and has been over a week with no issues. For the price, it is a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: SUNSHINE J

customer_reviews.title: Great customer follow up...
customer_reviews.text: Great customer support. I received an email from seller wanting to know if the acepc was working fine and with instructions for putting the OS on a ssd drive...good seller.
customer_reviews.author: chuck watson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mini computer love how it operates and I can put in my hard drive for extra storage very fast on my internet service
customer_reviews.author: Karl D. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Best budget Mini PC
customer_reviews.text: So I have bought 5 of these now and really like them. We install our video management software on these and add a 1tb wd black in the base and use these as servers for IP cameras. We can run 4x 4k ip cameras on these and it performs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Security Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good Support
customer_reviews.text: Using for my home automation system. It was simple to add a 120gb SSD to expand the required capacity. The company helped me upgrade the BIOS so that the unit would automatically restart after a power failure.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday home computer
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Fan is a little noisy. Added a solid state drive and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Xander Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually not one to write reviews, but this computer blew me away. It has all the perks including built in WiFi. Save yourself some money and buy one of these. Overall great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Karl Leitz

customer_reviews.title: One year in, all good!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit afraid of using a mini PC at first but I've had this one for a year now and all is running smoothly. I use it for browsing the web and watching netflix and stuff. Don't waste your time and money buying a massive computer if this is all you need!
customer_reviews.author: joanna toledo

customer_reviews.title: great media computer for my movies on my 60" led TV
customer_reviews.text: great media computer for my movies on my 60" led TV
customer_reviews.author: ClayD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and put a 1TB hard drive in, migrated the operating system and all works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jakary

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these units about six months ago and it came in DOA. Replacing it was easy enough (thanks Amazon) and the second one worked ok. Two days ago I purchased another one of these units, same model, only to have it ALSO show up DOA! What gives? The thing runs for under 3 minutes and shuts off! The ONLY thing that I like about these units was the included 2.5" drive bay and THAT is the reason this unit gets ONE star (and the fact that I can't give it a 0.5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Marcel R. Vachon

customer_reviews.title: Ok. But problems with memory card
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the most part. It doesn't seem to be compatible with the San disk that was recommended for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediately began to crash and reset...
customer_reviews.text: After the device booted up for the first time it immediately began to crash and reset. The boot screen would jitter and then Windows would restart then the process would repeat as soon as I tried to use the menu. I think this device was too good to be true; a Windows computer for about the price of a Windows license from Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good luck buying it
customer_reviews.text: Buy at your own risk. Right after the return period expired, my tv receive no signal from the mini pc. The mini pc is on, just the tv receive no signal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini pc
customer_reviews.text: Great mini pc thats superfast.. Perfect for productivity and lite gaming
customer_reviews.author: Swag Diddy

customer_reviews.title: It works great, fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about 6 months ago for my wife to use in her real estate office. She works online and in the Google sheets/docs/drive echo system. It works great, fast, smooth. Just bought another one for work tethered to a 2TB USB drive as a backup server. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MotorcycleMan

customer_reviews.title: Disable fast-boot
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble cloning the OS to the new Samsung msata using Samsung migrate software, but had a lot of trouble getting it to boot past the blue screen, would not load OS. The solution was turning off fast-boot. Seems to be working great now, I guess I'll see how it goes from here. I can't figure out what's wrong with the bluetooth, I can pair my bluetooth keyboard, but then the keyboard still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Windows Product Key
customer_reviews.text: These computers do not come with product Keys as stated in the description
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Randle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because the expansion box didn't work with ssd.
customer_reviews.author: MOHAMMED ALRAWILY

customer_reviews.title: Scam.  Pre-loaded spyware, perhaps virus.
customer_reviews.text: Pre-loaded with spyware and perhaps viruses. Extremely scammy. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Powers on and then off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just under a little over 2 weeks ago. It worked great when I had it but now when I turn it on the light flashes 2 times and then it turns off. Its dead 100%
customer_reviews.author: AlexB

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in just over a month
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for a month and using maybe 5 or 6 times, I tried to turn it on and the fan hums for a second and then stops and that's it. Will do this repeatedly but won't turn on. It was just a day or two outside my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Noah W.

customer_reviews.title: Mine quit working within 1 year of light use
customer_reviews.text: I can't find any way to contact ACEPC for repairs or advice. It worked well for a while, but I expected more than 11 months use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: dB

customer_reviews.title: PC DOESN'T LAST LONG
customer_reviews.text: The acepc for me didn't last it made noise and quit never again will I buy another buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: FLORIDA RAY

product_meta.title: ACEPC AK1 PRO,Mini PC Intel Celeron Processor J3455 Windows 10 Pro (64 bit) Desktop Computer [4GB/32GB/Support 2.5" SSD/mSATA SSD/Gigabit Ethernet/Dua-Band WiFi/4K]
product_meta.description:
Specification: 
Item size: 5*5*2 inchs 
CPU: Intel Celeron Processor J3455 (2M Cache, up to 2.3 GHz) 
RAM: 4 GB 
Storage: 32 GB eMMC onboard 
System: Preinstalled Win 10 Pro 
SATA: Support 1*2.5 inch SATA laptop HDD or SDD 
MSATA: Support 1*mSATA SSD 
# of Cores: 4 
# of Threads: 3 
Max Turbo Frequency: 2.3 GHz 
Processor Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 
USB port: 2* USB 3.0,2* USB 2.0 
Display Port: 1* HDMI+1* TYPE-C 
Lan Port: RJ 45 10/100/1000Mbps 
Mounting: VESA

Package List: 
The AK1 Mini PC 
A Power Adapter 
The User Manual 
A HDMI Cable 
A VESA Mount
feature_bullets: Powered by Intel Celeron J3455 processor at 1.50Ghz up to 2.3Ghz in Turbo mode. with 802.11ac Dual Band 2.4 & 5GHz Wi-Fi,it offers speeds of up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz.
UNIQUE SELLING POINT: Wake-on Lan supported. 2.5" HDD/SSD expansion box supplied,It's expandable with the addition of up to 2 TB of 2.5 inch SSD or HDD fitted in the base expansion box.
The Windows 10 Pro (64 bit) preinstalled,offers a multitude of extras aimed mainly at commerce and industry, but home users too
Designed with 2 x USB 2.0 ports,2 x USB 3.0 ports ,1 x Gigabit Ethernet port,1 x Micro SD Card port,1 x HDMI port,1 x Type-C
Support 4K HD for visually home entertainment,HTPC,perfect for home office, light games,digital Security and surveillance, digital signage, media center,conference room etc.

specifications.Wireless Type: 5 GHz Radio Frequency, 802.11ab, 2.4 GHz Radio Frequency
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars55 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
